page.about.greeting: Hello! My name is Ivan, I'm a frontend developer from Moscow.
page.about.technical: My technical skills include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Redux toolkit, NextJS, Node.js, Fresh, Tailwind, Sanity. I am constantly striving for development in this field and seeking opportunities to participate in interesting projects to expand my skills.
page.about.adaptable: I have a strong drive for learning and independence, which helps me successfully solve complex tasks. I enjoy working in a team, and I am always ready to collaborate with other developers to achieve collective success.
page.about.freetime: I like to keep abreast of the latest web development trends and technologies. In my free time, I like to be creative: composing music or creating videos.
page.about.goal: My goal is to continue developing as a developer and work on impactful projects that make the world a better place. I'm always open to new opportunities for growth, and I eagerly anticipate where my career will lead me in the future.
